title: Semantic Web and Databases
text: We invite the submission of short (up to six pages) and long papers (up to twenty
The submitted papers should be formatted as close as possible to the rules of
Springer LNCS (see http://www.springer.de/comp/lncs/authors.html, section "Proceedings and Other Multi-author Volumes" for formatting instructions).
Please submit documents as HTML, PDF, or Word to Isabel Cruz (ifc@cs.uic.edu)
